task.title: Converting legacy documents into DITA topics
task.shortdesc: Creating DITA topics from existing content is best done by hand rather than machine tools. This is because a "content analysis" step need to be done, it it can be done at the same time as conversion to XML.

section.title: Follow the STOP report
section.p: Written half a century ago, created for technical proposal in large teams, and using physical cut-and-paste methods, the STOP Reoprt still provides the best "topicising" instructions I've seem.
